name: Passage (itch) (Gianluca Alloisio)
description:
Just walk.

Controls

WASD to move (sorry French people, I'm in a hurry)
Mouse to look
Hold Shift to run
C to toggle crouch
Esc to toggle mouse lock

Page Up/Page Down to tweak mouse sensitivity (saved to file at each modification and loaded at startup)
Home to set mouse sensitivity to default

F1 to toggle the frame time plot
Alt + F4 to quit

Play

Download the zip of your platflorm and launch. Win, Mac and Linux.

Repository with Unity project.
